data.name: Pier Solar - The Definitive Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Definitive Enhanced Soundtrack in a stunning four BUNG-FULL discs.
The OST, Remixes & unused tracks... And the famous ESD (Enhanced Soundtrack Disc) to be played along with your Pier Solar cartridge.

Track list:

Pier Solar OST Disc 1:
1. Main Theme (2:19)
2. Ruins (3:53)
3. Illness (1:36)
4. Reja (2:36)
5. Hoston's Theme (2:16)
6. Edessot's Theme (2:27)
7. The Evergreen Fields (2:25)
8. Forest of Wonder (2:20)
9. Battle Theme (3:32)
10. Into the Dark (2:24)
11. Menace (3:45)
12. Boss Battle (2:46)
13. Ancient Garden (3:12)
14. Solution (1:27)
15. Ancient Ruins (2:18)
16. Alina's Theme (3:23)
17. The Flowing Waters (2:12)
18. Desert Sun (1:45)
19. Oasis Town (2:57)
20. Reunion (2:03)
21. Being Alone (4:04)
22. Goaman Village (1:45)
23. Caves (2:07)
24. Tragedy (3:02)
25. Mangrove (1:39)
26. Jungle (2:13)
27. Kruller's Town (1:55)
28. Secret Society (2:16)
29. Kruller's Theme (2:58)

Pier Solar OST Disc 2:
1. Mountain Range (2:30)
2. Hunting Lodge (2:08)
3. Point Zero Lake (2:22)
4. Point Zero Ruins (2:34)
5. Sea of Tears (2:32)
6. Bandit Town (1:58)
7. Madame Mazooca (2:39)
8. Verhansha Suburbs (2:19)
9. Timpo (2:47)
10. The Great Library (4:01)
11. Magic School (3:18)
12. Trench infinity (2:15)
13. Kleoneo's Castle (2:42)
14. Major Boss (4:16)
15. Crisis (2:19)
16. Zellini's Theme (3:36)
17. Jungle Jingle (2:33)
18. Dreaming (2:30)
19. Snow (1:46)
20. Cliboe Dimension (2:54)
21. Parallel Reja (2:52)
22. Bethina's Castle (3:08)
23. Final Battle (3:48)
24. A New Dawn (4:43)
25. Closing Credits (3:09)
26. Opening Credits (2:01)

Pier Solar OST Bonus Disc:
1. Desert (2:52)
2. jPop Acid Main Theme (3:27)
3. The Evergreen Flow (3:49)
4. Goaman's Epic Journey (1:52)
5. Kleoneo's Night Castle (4:28)
6. Crisis (2:47)
7. Boss Fantasia in E flat minor (2:26)
8. Hoston's Theme Remix (3:06)
9. Synthetic Forest (2:53)
10. Crisis GM303 (2:23)
11. Major Waltz (3:14)
12. A New Dawn (2:51)
13. GOA-MAN (5:00)
14. Witches and Ruins (3:16)
15. Village (3:10)
16. Cliboe Town (3:01)
17. Cliboe Dungeon (2:27)
18. Twilight Town (3:38)
19. Mysteries (3:16)
20. The Pier Solar (2:35)
21. Bethina's Theme (Alternate) (3:09)
22. Kleoneo meets Bethina (3:42)
23. Kleoneo's Theme (4:11)

Pier Solar Enhanced Soundtrack Disc:
1. ISO Data (627 MB)
2. Warning (1:20)
